reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. THEARD v. STATE, 498 So.2d 747 (La. 1986)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. EDGAR J. THEARD, III v. STATE OF LOUISIANA.

opinion.posture: In re Theard, Edgar J. III; applying for remedial writs; Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court, Div. "I", No. 281-985.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted. The district court is ordered to rule on the motion for production of documents there pending.
